did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library

bioghist.p: Auburn (N.Y.) Area Labor Council is part the New York State AFL-CIO which is a federation of 3,000 affiliated public sector, private sector, and building trades unions throughout the state, representing 2.5 million members, retirees and their families

accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.p: Auburn (NY) Area Labor Council Memorabilia #5892 MB. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.
